strategy_reasoning: Using a 'Cozy Dev Log' carousel format allows us to turn dry technical updates (removing buffers, API keys) into a narrative about gardening and inventory management. The retro game aesthetic makes infrastructure changes feel like 'patch notes' for a beloved game, keeping engagement high while informing the community.

images.prompt: Cozy 8-bit pixel art workspace scene. A vintage CRT monitor glowing softly on a wooden desk, surrounded by pixelated potted plants and a tiny sleeping cat. On the screen, pixel text reads 'DEV LOG'. Soft lime green (#ecf874) and lavender gradient background outside the window. Chunky retro sprites, warm lighting, lo-fi vibes like Unpacking or Stardew Valley. Nostalgic and welcoming.
images.description: Cover slide setting the cozy mood for the update.

images.prompt: Retro 8-bit pixel art scene showing a tiny bee character zooming fast across the screen, bypassing a clunky grey block labeled 'BUFFER'. The bee is carrying a glowing data packet directly to a cute pixelated birdhouse (Tinybird). Speed lines in lime green (#ecf874). Soft pastel sky background. Chunky pixels, happy vibes like A Short Hike. Visualizing the removal of D1 buffer for direct sending.
images.description: Visualizing the removal of the D1 buffer for faster data flow.

images.prompt: Cozy pixel art garden scene. A tiny robot gardener with a straw hat is pruning a digital bonsai tree. Snipping off a greyed-out branch labeled 'Unused API'. Soft mint and peach gradient background. Peaceful, zen garden vibes. 8-bit aesthetic with modern lighting. Visualizing the removal of the Anthropic workflow.

Retro RPG game inventory UI screen. A grid of item slots. One slot is glowing bright lime green (#ecf874) featuring a new item icon: a magical paintbrush labeled 'PolliDev'. Text box at bottom says 'NEW TOOL EQUIPPED'. Dark purple background with pixelated borders. Balatro or Stardew Valley UI style.
images.description: Announcing the new PolliDev tool as an acquired game item.

caption:

alt_text: Carousel of cozy pixel art images. 1. A retro computer workspace with plants. 2. A pixel bee flying past a buffer block. 3. A robot gardening a digital tree. 4. A retro game inventory screen showing a new tool called PolliDev.
